headline: Is KLA’s Growth Run Sustainable After Recent Chip Sector Slowdown in 2025?
summary: Trying to figure out what to do with KLA stock? You are not alone. This chip equipment giant has been one of the market’s powerhouses, turning a $10,000 investment five years ago into nearly $48,000 today for a return of 377%. While things have cooled in the last month, with the stock down 1.7%, KLA is still up 37.0% year-to-date and delivered a respectable 7.4% gain over the past year. The past week has seen only a slight uptick of 0.2%, hinting that investors might be pausing to reassess...
